reviewText:
My mom enjoyed EVERY one of these movies I purchased for her.  She's 93, has been in school several years studing English, and LOVES old timey Spanish movies.  Cantinflas does NOT disappoint LOL.
Great job Amazon!!!
Nothing like enjoying a good laugh with family seeing and hearing typical Cantinflas performance in one of his old movies
I grew up with Cantinflas and missed his type of humor. I truly enjoy this movie, it just puts me in a good mood. I would not recommend it if you do not master the Spanish language.
This Cantinflas movie finds him witty and humorous as usual. I was laughing out loud throughout the entire movie. I highly recommend seeing this movie. Then you too will want to buy it.

I did not know that Amazon carried mexican movies and checked. I was very surprised that my favorite Cantinflas movies were available through Amazon. I am very pleased with the purchase and as always whenever I am looking for something that I can not find in the store go to Amazon to look for it. I am enjoying the movie and brings happy memories from my childhood. Thank you amazon.
Its one of the best movies from him, his comedian way its at full size in this movie, and perhaps its enough to get the heart of anyone who sees it and understand it

Hilarious like all of Cantinflas movies are. Great for the family as well . Too bad there aren't many movies made like this anymore. Picture quality looks great considering it is an old movie. Movie arrived promptly and packaged well.
Great quality product and fast delivery
The subtitles are actually closed captions which are a little bit different.  Love the movie.
Mario Moreno the best Mexican comedian ever
Not one of his best but still funny enough
This is a pretty good movie, not my favorite from cantiflas but still very good and fun to watch. Would recommend if you like Cantinflas.
lo mmejor de lo mejor para aquellos que desean servir a su comunidad inteligentemente y sin prejuicios ni excusas y entregarse por una causa justa.
